00001 /*! \file 
00002     \brief Holds declarations for the synchronization sub-system. */
00003 
00004 #ifndef _SYNC_H_
00005 #define _SYNC_H_
00006 
00007 #include "threadqueue.h"
00008 
00009 #define MAX_NUMBER_OF_PORTS     (256)
00010 
00011 /*! Describes a port. */
00012 struct port
00013 {
00014  int           owner;  /*!< This is an index into process_table. The
00015                            index corresponds to the process that owns
00016                            this thread. */
00017  unsigned long id;     /*!< The identity number of the port. */
00018 
00019  struct thread_queue sender_queue; /*!< The queue of threads which are blocked on a send operation */
00020  
00021  int receiver; /*!< The identity of a thread which is blocked on a receive opereation. Set to -1 if no thread is receiving. */
00022 };
00023 
00024 extern struct port
00025 port_table[MAX_NUMBER_OF_PORTS];
00026 /*!< Array holding information all ports. */
00027 
00028 /*! Initializes the port table. */
00029 extern void
00030 initialize_ports(void);
00031 
00032 /*! Allocates and initializes one port from the port table.
00033     \return an index into the port_table if a port could be allocated or -1 
00034     if no ports are available. */
00035 extern int
00036 allocate_port(const unsigned long id
00037                /*!< Identity number of the port after allocation. */, 
00038               const int new_owner
00039                /*!< Id of the process becoming the new owner of the port after allocation. */);
00040 
00041 /*! Find a port with identity if owned by process owner. 
00042     \return the index into port_table of the port if a matching port is 
00043     found. Returns -1 otherwise. */
00044 extern int
00045 find_port(const unsigned long id
00046            /*! Identity number of the port that we want to find. */, 
00047           const int owner
00048            /*! Id of the owning process of the port that we want to find. */);
00049 
00050 /*! Initializes the thread synchronization sub-system. Used in task 6. */
00051 extern void
00052 initialize_thread_synchronization(void);

00055    here. */
